description:
Grafana Agent collects and forwards telemetry data to open source deployments of the Grafana Stack, Grafana Cloud, or Grafana Enterprise, where your data can then be analyzed.

**Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is
out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: Grafana Agent collects and forwards telemetry data to open source deployments of the Grafana Stack, Grafana Cloud, or Grafana Enterprise, where your data can then be analyzed.
author: Grafana Labs
